name: Wikipedia - Set maximum width of pages to 974px
description: This user style sets the maximum width of Wikipedia's pages to 974px in an effort to improve readability for users whose web browsers have wide viewports.
additional_info: The reason the max width is set specifically to 974px is because 974px seems to be the greatest width that is commonly used by web designers when creating layouts.[1][2] So most users should already be accustomed to this width. ---- [1] 974px is currently the greatest width that Yahoo includes in YUI, which is Yahoo's user interface library for web designers. [2] According to Google Browser Size, 90% of Google's users currently have a browser viewport that is at least 974px wide. So web designers will likely continue targeting this width into the near future.
